|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = AMD;AM29LV160DB; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 |ram1chip = ISSI;IS42S16100-7T; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Davicom;DM9161; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Z-Com XG-601 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Intersil;ISL3880; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3680; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :P/N: 512790-001-00 :GI: 512723-001-00
The FCC operational description for this device :is a detailed [[SerComm]] datasheet for the device. *It states the device is using the following... :a [[Brecis]] MSP2007 SoC :1MB of Flash (HY29LV800TT-70) and 4MB of RAM (IS42S16100-7T) :a [[NEC]] μPD720101 USB 2.0 controller :a ''Davicom'' DM9161 FE PHY :an ''Attansic'' AT7601F printer port controller
==Links of Interest== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=6614 Post regarding the device on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :states the device is using a [[Brecis]] MSP2007, :[[NEC]] μPD720101 USB controller, :''AMD'' AM29LV160DB Flash (2MB)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
